message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,000,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a lower price of $900,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I can come down slightly to $975,000.  This is my final offer.
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to offer $950,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
